title: Bulwark Platform Launch: A New Stage of Support
excerpt: We are officially launching a unified information resource to help Belarusian volunteers. Transparency, a knowledge base, and systematic support — now in one place.
content:
Platform Mission Features For Partners For Volunteers

Our Mission

Bulwark is a response to the demand for systematic support. We have created a platform that doesn't just collect donations but builds a bridge between those who help and those on the front lines.

Main goal: maximum efficiency of resources and legal safety of every soldier.

What does the platform offer?

  • Knowledge Base: detailed instructions on legalization in Ukraine, obtaining statuses, and documents.
  • Accountability: regular publications on the targeted use of funds.
  • Fast Communication: a direct channel for volunteer requests.

Benefits for Partners

We understand the importance of trust. Therefore, for large foundations and private philanthropists, we provide:

  • full audit of purchases;
  • photo and video confirmation of aid delivery;
  • direct communication with unit commanders.

For Volunteers

If you are a Belarusian fighting for Ukraine, Bulwark is your rear assistant. Here you will find answers to complex questions: from how to move your family to what to do in case of legal disputes with the migration service.

The site is operating in test mode. If you notice an error, please let us know via the feedback form.
